goals.title: Goals

meta.fallbackDescription: View goal details and progress on PeaklyGo.

descriptions.selectGoalType: Determine the format for achieving your goal. Each type has its own features and is suitable for different tasks.
descriptions.createStart: This is where your journey begins. Formulate what you want to achieve â€” clearly and specifically. When a goal takes on words, it stops being just a thought and becomes the first step toward real action.
descriptions.breakIntoSteps: Big goals are achieved with small steps. Divide your goal into concrete actions that will lead you to success. Each step is a small victory on the path to a big dream.
descriptions.habitFormation: Set up frequency and progress tracking. Small daily actions lead to big life changes.
descriptions.groupSetup: Bring your teammates together, agree on rules, and set expectations so everyone moves in sync toward the goal.
descriptions.groupHabitSetup: Set the rhythm for the habit and sync the team on how you'll achieve it together.
descriptions.setTiming: Define motivation and rewards. Clear motivation makes the goal meaningful, while rewards drive action.
descriptions.giveImage: You can add an image and choose a category. Visualization is a powerful tool: it makes the result tangible and closer. When a goal has an image, it's easier to imagine and strive for daily.
descriptions.finalStep: Last step! Configure additional parameters of your goal. You can create a challenge, invite friends, or just complete creation. Your goal is almost ready to launch!
descriptions.accountCreation: Create an account to save your goal, follow progress, receive community support, and share achievements. It only takes a minute to unlock the full experience.

fields.goalNamePlaceholder: For example, Run a half marathon
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: I've long dreamed of becoming more resilient and testing myself...
fields.rewardHelper: What will you reward yourself with when you achieve the goal?
fields.consequenceHelper: What will happen if you don't achieve the goal?

tips.canSkipDescription: You can add steps later while working on the goal. The main thing is to start!
tips.stepsShouldBring: Each step should bring you closer to the goal
tips.dontFearDetails: Don't be afraid to add details

groupTips.title: Teamwork boosts progress
groupTips.subtitle: Invite people you trust and agree on how you'll collaborate.

motivation.title: Mutual motivation
motivation.description: Encourage and support one another to keep momentum high.

progress.title: Shared progress
progress.description: Track the achievements of the whole team and celebrate milestones together.

experience.title: Knowledge exchange
experience.description: Share insights, tips, and best practices directly inside the team.

groupTips.quote: "If you want to go fast â€” go alone. If you want to go far â€” go together."

quotes.goalWithoutPlan: "A goal without a plan is just a wish"
quotes.thousandMilesJourney: "A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step"
quotes.bigJourneyStep: "A big journey begins with a small step"
quotes.timeIsLife: "Time is what life is made of"
quotes.dreamWithoutImage: "A dream without an image is just a wish. A dream with an image is a plan"
quotes.perfectionAchieved: "Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add, but when there is nothing left to take away"
quotes.habitQuote: "We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit"

goalTypes.habitGoalDescription: Goal for a specific number of days. Perfect for building habits and consistent daily practice.
goalTypes.groupChallengeDescription: Challenge involving other people. Motivation through community and healthy competition with friends.

hero.badge: Launch goals faster â€” focus on results
hero.title: Make progress visible. Achieve goals consciously.
hero.subtitle: PeaklyGo is where your goals turn into clear plans and understandable progress stories. No complexity, no noise â€” just moving forward.

mainHero.title: Achieve your goals together with
mainHero.subtitle: Plan, track, and share your goals. Get support from the community.

communityGoals.title: Our community's goals

features.title: Why PeaklyGo
features.subtitle: We removed everything unnecessary, leaving tools that really help move towards results.

goalsUnderControl.title: Goals under control
goalsUnderControl.description: Create SMART goals, break them into steps and track progress without unnecessary routine.

visibleProgress.title: Visible progress
visibleProgress.description: Progress feed turns the path into a story. Share and inspire others.

focusOnImportant.title: Focus on important
focusOnImportant.description: Minimal clicks, maximum meaning. Interface that doesn't distract.

synchronization.title: Synchronization
synchronization.description: Mobile and desktop experience without compromises. Everything works fast.

howItWorks.subtitle: Just 3 simple steps to achieve your dream

step1.title: 1. Create a goal
step1.description: Describe your goal, set deadlines and define key milestones to track.

step2.title: 2. Share with the world
step2.description: Share your goal with friends or the PeaklyGo community to get support.

step3.title: 3. Achieve success
step3.description: Track your progress, get motivation and celebrate your achievements with us.

user1.quote: With PeaklyGo I really saw for the first time how I move towards goals, not just write plans.
user1.name: Alex

user2.quote: Perfect for learning projects: progress is transparent, motivation is not lost.
user2.name: Maria

user3.quote: The team started achieving results faster: fewer meetings, more movement.
user3.name: Dmitry

q1.question: Is PeaklyGo paid?
q1.answer: Basic functionality is free. Premium â€” optionally, later.

q2.question: Can I keep private goals?
q2.answer: Yes. Goals are private by default. Publication is optional.

q3.question: How to share progress?
q3.answer: Publish the goal and send a link. You can limit visibility.
